Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: Very good, authentic Thai kitchen in a nice place, feeling like being in Thailand. Excellent and recommendable!

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: Delicious! Fantastic authentic pad Thai and other wonderful dishes- you really can't go wrong. The staff were very friendly and accommodating, with a sense of humor. Also, it was very easy to get a table outside at 7pm on a Saturday night, …

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: Compressed restaurant with little space for the customers. The waitress was a bit distracted and forgot what we ordered. However, after second food order, our dishes was prepared really fast. Food was delicious and spicy. Good portions. Beer could be cheaper.

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: Small restaurant but friendly staff.Prices of main dishes start at 15€.Appetizers were a bit greasy(fishcakes)but main dish"pat krapao gai" was spicy like it should be and enough chicken added.Price/quality ok

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: The food tastes very nice and portions are big. Very kind staff and average prices. Absolutely recommended

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: I genuinely feel this restaurant is not suitable for people that have food allergies or intolerances. I say this because I found an unidentified foreign object in my vegan dish that resembled a shell of something or a bone. Apart from that …

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: very very delicious, I will definitely be going back. I ordered the vegetarian pad thai to share with my boyfriend and we loved it. lots of flavor and such a perfect serving size as well, friendly staff and food came quick as we were the only ones there.

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: As many have mentioned, the wonderful soups here at Little Thai Prince are amazing! The spicy Chicken and Mushroom soup is by far the best soup I have eaten in a restaurant. The soup itself earned a five start rating.

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: This food is so good!  The restaurant is small and simple, but the food is so good!  I think all of us cleaned our plates.  Very good spot if you are in Amsterdam!

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: Friendly English-speaking staff, and nice atmosphere. Vegan options not clearly marked, but staff helpful and food tasty

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: We had a great dinner in this place. Very tasty, full of flavour, soup and mains. My stir fry looked very pretty and was so so good. Staff was nice too

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: Excellent  food 😋 very authentic  if they moved outside  it would be just like  eating in chang mai best we have had  outside  Thailand

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: A great little thai oasis on the edge of busy Chinatown. This might be the best to food we've eaten in Europe. I would highly recommend it. Sit right in the back and you can see the food being prepared in a relatively small, open kitchen. All the staff are Thai and most of the food is made in the Thai, rather than western style.

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: The food here was so tasty! We totally enjoyed every dish, be it king prawns, chicken or the beef dishes, all was yum. Also great value for money and the service was friendly also. Definitely recommend

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: The food is AMAZING, one the best thai ever!! Definitively will be back here on my next trip to Amsterdam. Spices are real though

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text:
Amazing food and service ! Really nice people !

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: Great authentic Thai food. Phad Thai with prawns was really well done, but not very spicy.  Chicken Satay was really very nice and the local beer washed everything down nicely.  Small but cozy place with excellent service.

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: Last weekend I took my partner here for her birthday. A good decision. The owner is super welcoming, enthusiastic and very friendly. The atmosphere is nice, it’s a small restaurant with a small menu which I like a lot. Still hard to choose …

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: Excellent food and quaint location. Completely satisfied my cravings for Thai food.

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: Great food, friendly staf!

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: Food was alright. A bit overhyped we thought. Everything we ordered had a curry powder under taste to it. I don't know if it's just the things we ordered or if it's adapted to suit the Dutch who love their 'curry powder'. All in all not a big thumbs up from us.

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: The best Thia food I have had the pleasure of tasting

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: I would give this place 5 stars for the food. Very tasty.  Gets 3 stars because they would not serve us tap water unless we ordered drinks!  So I ordered a tiny bottle of water (2 euros) and asked again for tap water.  I was informed that …

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: It's Thai food. The restaurant is very small, the waiters were not friendly and not listening to our request. But the food were quite ok. Location of the restaurant is 10-15 minutes walk from Amsterdam Central.

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: A little gem tucked away in a small street across Amsterdam Central station. the place is small and cosy.It has very good options on veg dishes and tastes very good. Kitchen is clean and the hosts have a very good way of providing timely service. Go for It!!

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: Really great good and nice + fast service. I will surely visit again:)

Review Text: The Little Prince is less crowded than other options around, feels more cozy and I have a slight preference for their dishes. Very tasty and lovely dishes, reasonable prices. Great Thai experience in town.

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: We are visiting and last  Saturday night was crowded everywhere with big lines outside, we were lucky to get a table in this little restaurant. The food was very good and tasty, the service was very friendly and efficient. The prices are good for what you get.

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: Starter was great! Mains were pretty big portions looking at what friends ordered. Was pretty disappointed with my green curry, wasn't a thick enough coconutty broth, as was the red curry, however, service was excellent with friendly staff and just within walking distance from Centraal station.

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: The food was delicious and quantity served was pretty good. We ordered soup and veg noodle meal and everything was fabulous.

Name: Little Thai Prince

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: The Thai food here is close to been authentic. Their even have their Thai beer. The spiciness isn't close to what Thailand has to offer. Probably has to tune it down to suite the people's taste.

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: I simply asked for tap water, the grumpy rude waitress (who's there quite often) refused saying it was a "new policy"  and that I should go to mc Donald's if I wanted free water... I rarely respond to these kind of comments, I just walked off and will never go back there anymore..

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: Try the Tom Yum Soup! Amazing authentic Thai food. The location is close to the central station making it easy to get to and the service here is fantastic. Recommendable.

Name: Little Thai Prince
Review Text: Wow, wow and wow. What a find! Tiny little place completely hidden away but some of the most authentic and best tasting food of this nature I have ever had. Go early to avoid any disappointment in not getting a table.
